other_tests.findings: Identified novel MODY3 HNF1A mutation and known MODY1 mutation in HNF4A.

Case 1 - at 20 months, blood glucose 2.6 mmol/liter, inappropriately suppressed hydroxylbutyrate; plasma insulin undetectable. Case 2 - at 3 months, blood glucose 1.1 mmol/liter, suppressed ketone production, positive glucagon stimulation test.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Case 1 - by age 6, complete resolution of hyperinsulinism. Case 2 - normal adaptation to fasting at 42 months.

other_tests.findings: Showed abundant cytoplasmic glycogen with mild portal inflammation and fibrosis in Case 3.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Mildly elevated liver transaminases and mild hepatomegaly still present at age 6.
